thread.title: Woman carjacked after being rear-ended in Algiers Point
thread.title_full: Woman carjacked after being rear-ended in Algiers Point - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Woman carjacked after being rear-ended in Algiers Point
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - A woman who was rear-ended in Algiers Point was carjacked by the people who hit her.
Police are looking for two men and the victim’s 2015 gray Toyota RAV4 with a Saints license plate. The incident took place Tuesday (Sept. 29) at the intersection of Evelina and Oliver streets.
At approximately 3:30 p.m., the victim was driving in the area when she was struck in the back by the driver of another vehicle. When the victim got out of her vehicle to look at the damage, a man got out of the other vehicle, got into the victim’s vehicle, implied that he had a gun and sped off.
The driver of the other vehicle also fled the scene.
Both suspects were only described as black males.
The photo at right is the same type as that stolen in the carjacking.
Fourth District Detectives are investigating the incident and can be contacted at (504) 658-6040.
Citizens with information that can help solve this crime are asked to call Crimestoppers at 822-1111 or toll-free 1-877-903-STOP. You could receive a cash reward of up to $2,500 for the information leading only to the arrest, except on homicides, where Crimestoppers will pay half of the reward upon the arrest and half on the indictment of the responsible person(s). You do not have to give your name nor testify to receive the reward but you must contact Crimestoppers directly with your information.
